enrichment_payload.temporal_pattern: Recurring severe flooding events across Indonesian archipelago with increasing frequency over past decade
enrichment_payload.magnitude_baseline: Among deadliest recent flooding events in Bali and Flores regions, exceeding typical seasonal monsoon impacts
enrichment_payload.systemic_context: Accelerating climate change impacts on island nations and coastal regions documented by IPCC and UN climate reports
enrichment_payload.why_strategic: Demonstrates acute vulnerability of archipelagic states to climate change, requiring international adaptation and disaster response coordination
